name: krisenchat gGmbH
introduction: In a crisis? Text us. We'll help you!

sections.title: Goal of the project
sections.content: We want to support young adults by offering chat support by professionals. Our team work especially on the infrastructure and the tools for our counsellors.

sections.title: Future
sections.content: In the future, we want to improve the webapp for our counsellors to make counselling more valuable.
